name: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
description:
Toss dwarves into waves of orcs to earn Maggoty Bread. GOSH!

Mouse Click or hold 'E' to grab a dwarf. Move your mouse and let go to yeet'em into those gosh darn orcs!

Earn 3 Maggoty Breads for each level to unlock GOSH MODE to wreck havoc and discover hidden secrets!

I made this game in 3 days with little sleep, so mind any bugs you run into. Enjoy, and be sure to eat your maggoty bread. Gosh!

Consider donating 12.96... a very good price. Almost as old as I am! Or Venmo all that extra dough layin' around to @BurtBot

NOTE: Unlike the video, I could use only original voices for this game :D

Thanks for checking out my game!

-----

-----

Download Instructions:

PC / Windows - Download the PC Zip, extract it, and run the "Nobody Tosses a Dwarf" .exe Application.

MAC - Download the MAC Zip, extract it, and run the "Nobody Tosses a Dwarf" Mac OS App.
